attributes.additional_details:
I think I speak for many people on asking for indoor gyms to be opened back up safely somehow. Many people suffering with mental health problems see the gym as a way to escape and keep themselves on track mentally. There are many other establishments opened that would easily pose the same risk as a gym but these are allowed to be open and the gyms aren't?

Please open indoor gyms 🙏

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
